definition: Liu Xiang (1983-), Chinese gold-medal hurdler of the 2004 Olympic Games
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Liu
to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教练孙海平对刘翔此次所承受的压力表示担心。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Trammell was really a good rival.
sentences.chinese: 第三，特拉梅尔是一位可以激发刘翔潜能的对手。

sentences.english: Sure, everybody was watching the performance of Chinese Flying man Liu Xiang.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，所有的人都在看中国飞人刘翔的表现。

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥运会境内第一棒火炬手刘翔跑过天安门广场。

sentences.english: Winning his heat in a comfortable 14.02 seconds in front of 3500 people at Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground, Liu Xiang finally strode home with 13.66 seconds for the title.
sentences.chinese: 而在此前的预赛中，刘翔以14秒02轻松晋级。

sentences.english: In the cafeteria at Liu's training base, the hurdler has his own dining table.
sentences.chinese: 在训练基地的食堂里，刘翔拥有自己的专座。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang is the most hardworking sportsman that I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔是我所见过的最勤奋的运带动。

sentences.english: And Liuxiang won a gold medal in the Athens 2004 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 还有刘翔雅典奥运会勇夺金牌那一刻。

sentences.english: Soaring is just what China expects Liu to do.
sentences.chinese: 飞翔正是中国期待刘翔做到的。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang's coach, Sun Haiping, also scooped the best coach award.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔的教练孙海平也获得了最佳教练的称号。

sentences.english: LuiXiang is also international sports star.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔也是国际运动名星。

sentences.english: Liu was inconsolable after he walked into the stadium tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 在走进体育场通道时，刘翔极为伤心。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang spearheads Team China to Daegu meet.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔领衔中国队出征大邱世锦赛。

sentences.english: The Chinese often praise Liu and the basketball star Yao Ming for their modesty.
sentences.chinese: 中国人经常赞美刘翔和姚明为他们中庸之道的代言人。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang has undergone a successful surgery in the US which ended Saturday morning (Beijing Time).
sentences.chinese: 北京时间6日凌晨，刘翔在美国成功接受脚部手术。

sentences.english: Liu's compatriot Shi Dongpeng finished second in 13.56 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔的同胞史冬鹏以13秒56的成绩完成比赛。

definition: Deng Yaping (1973-), table tennis player, several times world and Olympic winner
Wang Liqin (1978-), former PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
Li Na (1982-), Chinese tennis player, first Asian player to win a Grand Slam singles title (2011 French Open women's singles)
Wang Junxia (1973-), Chinese long-distance runner
Guo Jingjing (1981-), Chinese female diver and Olympic gold medalist
Fu Mingxia (1978-), Chinese diving champion
hurdles/hurdle race (athletics)
Zhang Yining (1981-), PRC female table tennis player and Olympic gold medalist
sprint (race)
track and field (athletics)
Tian Liang (1979-), former male Chinese diver, Olympic medalist
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Jenny Lang Ping (1960-), Chinese volleyball player, coach of USA women's national team since 2005
Phelps (name)/Michael Phelps (1985-), US swimmer and multiple Olympic gold medallist
Wang Nan (1978-), female PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
